channel.title: PI What files to change in the Server
channel.description: i cant connect to my server on moparscape client, so what files do i need to change in the server foldeR?

item.title: PI What files to change in the Server
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:10, topic:412424”]You don’t need to change anything in the server folder!
Your client is the thing connecting to your Host!
The whole point of the source is just running information on port 43594.
Which your client connects to…[/quote]

FFFs!!! IVE DONE EVERYTHING AND IT STILL SAYS ERROR CONNECTING TO FUCKING SERVER !!!

Read full topic
item.source: PI What files to change in the Server

item.title: PI What files to change in the Server
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

You don’t need to change anything in the server folder!
Your client is the thing connecting to your Host!
The whole point of the source is just running information on port 43594.
Which your client connects to…

Read full topic
item.source: PI What files to change in the Server

item.title: PI What files to change in the Server
item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

go armand:

That’s why you go to client.java and search server = then change it from 127.0.0.1 to yours. then you send the client out…

did that

//server = "survivescape.no-ip.biz ";
//server = “survivescape.no-ip.biz”;
server = “survivescape.no-ip.biz”;

error connecting to server.

i havent changed anything in the server folder, so i havent set what ip the server is connecting to…
but my no-ip and port is done.

What do i change in the server folde?R

Read full topic

go armand:

If you give your friends the client they can play too…

no they cant, because they’ll be connecting to 127.0.0.1 …

item.dc:creator: @Delta1wolf Delta1wolf
item.description:
@Delta1wolf wrote:

JavaTC:

You don’t change anything? You just open run.bat and connect with the client

the server doesn’t know what to connect to?
runelocus says
survivescape.no-ip.biz is online
but i cant connect to it on moparscape client?
